___freq.description: Used when a temporal expression is of the type SET. Contains an integer value and a time granularity that represent the frequency at which the temporal expression regularly reoccurs

___anchorTimeID.description: ID of the temporal expression to which the TIMEX3 in question is temporally anchored

___quant.description: Used when a temporal expression is of the type SET. A literal from the text that quantifies

___tid.description: Non-optional attribute.  Each TIMEX3 expression has to be identified by a unique ID number.

___temporalFunction.description: Indicates if the temporal expression needs to be determined via evaluation of a temporal function.

___beginPoint.description: Used when a duration is anchored by another time expression, as well a for range expressions.

___value.description: This value is given in an extended ISO 8601 format.

___endPoint.description: Used when a duration is anchored by another time expression, as well a for range expressions.
